text.section: Each county board shall establish a dispute resolution process to address disputes regarding the requirements imposed and the rights conferred by this subtitle.
During the dispute resolution process the child in State-supervised care shall remain enrolled in the receiving school.
A child in State-supervised care who is the subject of a dispute shall be provided appropriate educational services including the implementation of an existing individualized education program.
The Department shall adopt regulations to implement this section on or before January 1, 2006.
